metadata.title: CVE-2021-47474 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:comedi: vmk80xx: fix bulk-buffer overflowThe driver is using endpoint-sized buffers but must not assume that thetx and rx buffers are of equal size or a malicious device could overflowthe slab-allocated receive buffer when doing bulk transfers.
